title: LF 1 ADC for 3 Man Team for Ranked
body:
Yo, I used to be the best fiddle on OCE at one point according to lolskill. Anyway, I was diamond in season 3. I am pretty shit now, but I do okay. I play Fiddle only. Me and my mate (who plays support) are looking for a mature ADC. My mate is Gold 2 , I am silver 5. Basically looking for somebody who plays ADC every game where possible. 
Hit me up in lolking or add me in game 'hi im danny'. 
We play around 2 games a night - we play seriously, but we dont rage, and we dont grind game after game like others. 
Cheers

replies.body:
i main adc, add me ign mainatvayne 
xox
